body.name: Playskool Sit ‘n Spin Classic Spinning Activity Toy for Toddlers Ages Over 18 Months (Amazon Exclusive)
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 17. Order within 9 hrs 58 mins

features: PLAYTIME COMES FULL CIRCLE : Remember when you discovered how to sit, spin, and giggle yourself silly. Well, now it’s time for YOUR little one to enjoy the winning spinning fun of this classic sit on spinning activity toy
TURN THE FUN LOOSE : The fun goes round and round with this twirling activity toy for toddlers. Push and pull the stationary wheel to make the base spin fast or slow. Kids control the speed

A CLASSIC SPIN ON ACTIVE PLAY : With spin tactic spinning action, this super fun activity toy for toddlers 18 months and up gets them whirling and twirling and helps them practice balance, coordination, and motor skills
HOURS OF INDOOR FUN : A favorite preschool play activity for generations, a wild ride on the Playskool Sit and Spin toy is a great way to get their giggles and wiggles out

EASY FRUSTRATION FREE SHIPPING : Ships in simple recyclable brown packaging that’s easy to open and frustration free, so your busy little bee can get to the play right away ; Product color may vary as per stock availability
body.description: Product Description A beloved family favorite, this classic spinning activity toy for toddlers has been spinning out fun for generations! Awesome for active indoor play, the Playskool Sit ‘n Spin toy lets your toddler control the spinning action with an easy to spin design that can go fast or slow. Kids 18 months and up can spin their sillies out, while the active play can encourage balance, coordination, motor skills—and perhaps even a post playtime nap! Playskool and all related properties are trademarks of Hasbro. From the Manufacturer The classic Sit 'n Spin toy has all the twirling' fun you grew up with and your child will love to whirl, twirl and spin on it. The toy encourages balance and coordination and now it spins even more easily and smoothly. Turn the wheel to start the fun and watch your child have a ball and stay active.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Small but works great!
reviews.reviewText: Super fun and pretty sturdy. It's smaller than anticipated, but my 4 and 5 year olds both love it. Good purchase!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fun and easy to assemble
reviews.reviewText: My 3 year old and 1.5 year old both love playing with this. And it gets a lot of their energy out. Very cute and easy to assemble

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Daughters Favorite Christmas Present
reviews.reviewText: Gave this to my 2.5 year old this past Christmas and it was by far her favorite gift! She continued to gravitate toward it all that day out of the plethora of stuffed animals, games, and toys. A bit large and has a unique shape so we threw it in a reusable drawstring gift bag instead of trying to wrap it.We're about a month in and she still loves it.So much joy from such a simple toy.Took less than 10 minutes to assemble, it was very easy and intuitive to put together. You'll just need a screw driver.Durable and sturdy. Daughter is about 33 lbs and has used it regularly without causing damage or injury to herself. It has become a permanent fixture in our family room.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Old School Joy
reviews.reviewText: Loved giving this to my toddler family member. The base is very sturdy. Toddler was able to sit and spin immediately. The seat rotates smoothly. It’s been decades since I’ve seen a sit and spin, and this one may be a little smaller than I remember. Toddler had so much fun spinning. Glad I purchased it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Can't wait for her to open and play with this!
reviews.reviewText: So I got this to give to my 3 year old niece for Christmas. We're exchanging gift soon, within this week. I can't wait for her to play with this. This is a nostalgic toy for me. I remember having one when I was a kid. I can't wait to see her reaction and see her play with it! I'm sure my 9 year old niece will want to play with it as well.It was fairly easy to put together. You do need a Philips screw driver for the 3 screws and it takes 3 AAA batteries in the bottom cuz it does play music. Highly recommend this toy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for the grandkidso
reviews.reviewText: I purchased one of these last year for my granddaughter for her birthday. It provided so much entertainment for her. This year, I purchased one for my grandson. He is younger and has not quite figured it out yet. But in time, he will. I think this is well suited for at least a two year old.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Blast from the past!
reviews.reviewText: Growing up, the Sit 'n Spin was my favorite! It's so simple, and so classic. I have a 2 1/2 year old great nephew, and knew this was the gift for him (well, one of the gifts, because who am I kidding - that kid is worth it!). It was really adorable to watch him sit on it and figure out how to get himself to spin - love that he can enjoy something I loved so much as a kid!
This sit & spin is soooo fun!! My daughter loves it so much and is always messing around on it. I would for sure recommend for children under 6 or so

My kids had this when they were little. When Grandkids came along we tried to find one for them. Several years later we saw this on Amazon. My littlest grandsons are going to absolutely love this at Christmas. Pleasing 4 generations. What a great toy, keeps them busy for ages, and gets out their crazies a bit too. thanks
Mi hijo se ha entretenido mucho con el.Tiene más de 2 años que lo compré y sigue en muy buenas condiciones a pesar de el uso rudo.Muy recomendable.
Came in time and was exactly what I ordered. Kids love it

Ich habe das Wirbelwind Karussell auf Grund der positiven Bewertungen gekauft. Und ich muss sagen, es lohnt sich, auf die Bewertungen zu hören :)Mein 2,5 jähriger Enkel hat den Sinn bereits kurzer Zeit erkannt und war sehr begeistert. Er ist immer wieder auf das Karussell gestiegen und hat gedreht, was das Zeug hält. Er hat dann noch einige andere Positionen ausprobiert, z. B. hat er sich auf den Bauch gelegt und sich mit den Händen vom Boden abgestoßen.Es ist ein mega tolles Spielzeug, was ich nur empfehlen kann. Preis-Leistungs-Verhältnis ist auch super. Das einzige Manko ist, dass die Melodie etwas eintönig ist, da sie sehr kurz immer wieder die selbe Frequenz spielt. Vorteil ist aber, dass man die Musik auch ausstellen kann und das Karussell trotzdem funktioniert.Ich vergebe die volle Punktzahl von 5 *
